definition: opposition faction
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Eastern Front, the opposition attack again Zili Tan 19.
sentences.chinese: 東線戰場上，反對派19日再次進攻茲利坦。

sentences.english: But Cameron, watching from the Opposition benches, took it all in.
sentences.chinese: 但從反對派來看，卡梅倫接受了這一切。

sentences.english: Ms. Otunbayeva said the opposition was taking control of police and military forces.
sentences.chinese: 歐坦貝耶娃說，反對派已經控制了警察和軍隊。

sentences.english: The Bani walid Green resistance has killed hundreds of Rebels at Outskirt desert.
sentences.chinese: 綠色抵抗武裝在郊區的沙漠擊斃數百名反對派。

sentences.english: We're offering support to the Libyan opposition.
sentences.chinese: 我們也將爲利比亞反對派提供支援。

sentences.english: Mr Samaras, as opposition leader, has taken an equivocal position.
sentences.chinese: 作爲反對派領袖，薩馬拉斯的立場搖擺不定。

sentences.english: Mr ElBaradei has been asked by opposition groups to negotiate with the authorities on forming a national unity government.
sentences.chinese: 反對派請求巴拉迪去和當局者就組成聯合政府談判。

sentences.english: Bahrain's main opposition party, Wefaq, is boycotting the poll.
sentences.chinese: 巴林的主要反對派維法格黨呼籲抵制選舉。

sentences.english: Some users have suggested that rebels had infiltrated the city.
sentences.chinese: 一些網民認爲反對派已經滲透進了該城市。

sentences.english: He was invited by the pro-independence opposition to tour areas devastated by Typhoon Morokot.
sentences.chinese: 他受支持獨立反對派邀請訪問受颱風莫拉克摧毀地區。

sentences.english: Another nine people have been sentenced to death for taking part in pro-opposition demonstrations.
sentences.chinese: 還有9人因參加支持反對派遊行示威被判死刑。

sentences.english: The arms embargo, which applies equally to Gaddafi and the opposition, will have to be circumvented.
sentences.chinese: 對卡扎菲及其反對派的武器禁運必須要想辦法規避。

sentences.english: He described opposition forces as "traitors" and "sons of dogs".
sentences.chinese: 他稱反對派力量是“背叛者”和“走狗”。

sentences.english: Cwele's arrest has led to opposition calls for her husband's resignation.
sentences.chinese: Cwele被捕引發反對派要求她的丈夫辭職。

sentences.english: Grandhi does not wish to provoke them any more than necessary.
sentences.chinese: 反對派的策略之一就是要激怒我們。

sentences.english: The anti-Gaddafi forces acknowledge that they could not have done it alone.
sentences.chinese: 反對派也承認，他們不能只靠孤軍奮戰。
